about_the_game:
Tanner "Cookie" Rozankovic is an Australian video game designer. He is best known for working as a 3D Artist and C++ Programmer.
An all in one beginner's guide, into the depths of game development and design, directly from a developer who learnt online.

Are you looking to learn more about, game design and the core fundamentals needed to successfully create your first game? Well then
what are you waiting for, it's free! Learn about the fundamentals by following a step-by-step tutorial for each section of your game, from animation to networking solutions, we have got you covered.

name: Tanner Rozankovic

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster.
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster.
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1060 GTX
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
